suite.name: Example Variables

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

suite.name: Test Ecommerce With Selenium

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Address
kw.doc: :example '791 Crist Parks, Sashabury, IL 86039-9874'

kw.name: Dado que estou na página home do site
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Digitar o nome do produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisar
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então o produto "Blouse" deve ser listado na página de resultado da busca
Conferir se o produto "${PRODUTO}" foi listado no site
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.

kw.name: Dado que estou na página home do site
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Quando eu pesquisar pelo produto "Produto não existe"
Digitar o nome do produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisar
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Produto não existe' into text field 'id=search_query_top'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então a página deve exibir a mensagem "No results were found for your search "Produto não existe""
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="center_column"]/p[@class='alert alert-warning']' contains exact text 'No results were found for your search "Produto não existe"'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="center_column"]/h1/span' contains exact text '0 results have been found.'.

kw.name: Dado que estou na página home do site
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Quando passar o mouse na categoria "WOMEN"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Então as sub categorias devem ser exibidas
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então uma página com os produtos da sub categoria "${SUB_CATEGORIA}" deve ser exibida
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'class=category-name' contains exact text 'Summer Dresses'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Dado que estou na página home do site

kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Então o produto "Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts" deve ser listado na página de resultado da busca
Conferir se o produto "${PRODUTO}" foi listado no site
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Link
kw.doc: Verifies link identified by ``locator`` is found from current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains link 'xpath=//*[@id="center_column"]//a[@class="product-name"][contains(text(),"Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts")]'.

kw.name: E ao clicar no botão "Add to cart" do produto
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então uma tela de confirmação deve ser exibida
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Quando clicar no botão "Proceed to checkout"
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então a tela do carrinho de compras deve ser exibido, juntamente com os dados do produto adicionado e os devidos valores

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'class=heading-counter' contains exact text 'Your shopping cart contains: 1 Product'.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath=//*[@id="product_1_1_0_0"]/td[2]/p/a' contains exact text 'Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts'.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
